alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Dewey (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 8:28AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Custer, northwestern Blaine, eastern Dewey and southeastern Major Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 828 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Canton Lake to 7 miles southwest of Putnam. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fairview, Taloga, Okeene, Thomas, Canton, Longdale, Oakwood, Putnam, Canton Lake, Orion, Eagle City, Isabella, Fay, Homestead, Hucmac, and Southard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
